channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Data-Center Owners Get an Edge Over Big Tech Tenants, Finally
item.description: An artificial-intelligence land grab is lifting shares of the centers’ landlords, such as Equinix, after years of mediocre rent growth.

item.title: Investing legend Howard Marks shares how investors can take advantage of ‘irrational’ markets
item.description: Now that the dust has settled from the latest tumultuous stretch for stocks, billionaire investor Howard Marks is taking the opportunity to remind his...

item.title: A Time-Honored Strategy Puts Your Retirement at Risk of Financial Ruin
item.description: The tried-and-true 60/40 portfolio and 4% withdrawal rate in retirement could lead to “catastrophic” outcomes if markets behave differently than in th...

item.title: ‘I have a dirty secret’: When I fly, I erase ‘basic economy’ on my ticket to skip the boarding line. My friend says it’s cheating. Who’s right?
item.description: “My friend says it’s cheating, as business passengers pay more money for early boarding.”

item.title: Nvidia Is Up 2,000% Since 2019. These WSJ Readers Invested Early.
item.description: Eight investors share why they bought the chip maker’s stock—and how much they have made.

item.title: I’m a veteran, 53, with 6 degrees and $245,000 in student debt. I plan to discharge my loans due to my disability when I hit $1 million. Is this immoral?
item.description: “After my school expenses are paid, I receive a refund for approximately $7,000 up to four times a year. “

item.title: The New Etiquette of Negotiating With Your Real-Estate Agent
item.description: What buyers should look out for in agent agreements.

item.title: Tim Walz took an early withdrawal from his retirement account. Is it ever OK to dip into your 401(k)?
item.description: The Democratic vice-presidential candidate’s campaign confirmed Walz’s withdrawal from a 401(k)-type plan.

item.title: Engine Shortages Have Grounded Airlines. This Company Has the Formula to Fix That.
item.description: Being a one-stop shop for leasing, repairs and parts has made FTAI one of the commercial-aviation industry’s few bright spots.

item.title: New Samsung EV battery technology has captivated silver bulls. Here’s the argument.
item.description: Soaring EV demand, along with solar, jewelry and investment will tighten the market
